Description: The following statement contains a magic number: Content = new StackLayout              {                  Margin = new Thickness(20)'                  VerticalOptions = LayoutOptions.StartAndExpand'                  Children =                   {                      new Label { Text = "Name" }'                      nameEntry'                      new Label { Text = "Notes" }'                      notesEntry'                      new Label { Text = "Done" }'                      doneSwitch'                      saveButton'                      deleteButton'                      cancelButton                  }              };
The following statement contains a magic number: listView = new ListView { ItemTemplate = dataTemplate' Margin = new Thickness(20) };
